channel.title: Workshops on Rosalyn Spencer
channel.description: Recent content in Workshops on Rosalyn Spencer

item.title: Innovative Teaching Workshops
item.description:
This ongoing workshop series provides hands-on training for teachers seeking to expand their instructional toolkit. Each session combines theoretical foundations with practical implementation strategies that participants can immediately apply in their classrooms.

Workshop Topics Include

  • Inquiry-based learning facilitation
  • Digital tools for student engagement
  • Differentiated instruction in diverse classrooms
  • Project-based learning design
  • Assessment for learning strategies

Workshops are available as in-person sessions, virtual seminars, or customized school-based professional development programs. All participants receive comprehensive resource materials and ongoing support through our educator community platform.
